#!/bin/bash
# STRICT NO-ANY-TYPE CHECK with multiple patterns
if [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" == *.ts ]] || [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" == *.tsx ]]; then
  # Multiple patterns to catch all any usage
  ANY_PATTERNS=(
    ':\s*any(\s|\[|\)|,|;|$|>)'
    '\<any\>'
    'as\s+any'
    'Array<any>'
    'Promise<any>'
    'Record<[^,]+,\s*any>'
    ': {\[key: string\]: any}'
  )
  
  FOUND_ANY=0
  VIOLATIONS=""
  
  for pattern in "${ANY_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if matches=$(grep -En "$pattern" "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" | grep -v '// eslint-disable\|// @ts-ignore\|// @ts-expect-error\|// TODO:' | head -5); then
      FOUND_ANY=1
      VIOLATIONS="${VIOLATIONS}${matches}\n"
    fi
  done
  
  if [ $FOUND_ANY -eq 1 ]; then
    echo "\nğŸš« BLOCKED: 'any' type detected in ${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH##*/}"
    echo "âŒ CODE KAI VIOLATION: No 'any' types allowed!"
    echo "\nğŸ“‹ Violations found:"
    echo -e "$VIOLATIONS" | head -10
    echo "\nâœ… Required fixes:"
    echo "  1. Use Zod schemas with proper types from docs/api/"
    echo "  2. Use 'unknown' with type guards: isValidResponse()"
    echo "  3. Import types: import { PropertyResponse } from '../types/api-responses'"
    echo "  4. Define interfaces for complex objects"
    echo "\nğŸ“š Examples from codebase:"
    echo "  // âŒ BAD:  response: any"
    echo "  // âœ… GOOD: response: unknown + validateApiResponse(response, schema)"
    echo "  // âœ… GOOD: response: PropertyResponse (with runtime validation)"
    echo "\nğŸ”§ Quick fix: Replace 'any' with 'unknown' then add validation"
    exit 2
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Run related tests for changed files
if [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" == *.ts ]] && [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" != *test* ]] && [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" != */*.d.ts ]]; then
  cd /Users/acedergr/Projects/alecs-mcp-server-akamai
  
  # Find related test files
  if npx jest --listTests --findRelatedTests "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" 2>/dev/null | grep -q test; then
    echo "ğŸ§ª Running related tests..."
    # Run in background with summary output
    (
      if npx jest --findRelatedTests "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" --passWithNoTests 2>&1 | tee /tmp/jest-related.log | grep -E "PASS|FAIL"; then
        passes=$(grep -c "PASS" /tmp/jest-related.log || echo 0)
        fails=$(grep -c "FAIL" /tmp/jest-related.log || echo 0)
        [ $fails -eq 0 ] && echo "âœ… All $passes related tests passed" || echo "âŒ $fails tests failed"
      fi
      rm -f /tmp/jest-related.log
    ) &
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Pre-commit quality gate
if echo "${CLAUDE_TOOL_PARAMS_COMMAND}" | grep -qE '^git commit'; then
  cd /Users/acedergr/Projects/alecs-mcp-server-akamai
  echo "ğŸ” Running pre-commit quality checks..."
  
  # Track failures
  FAILED=0
  
  # TypeScript check
  echo -n "  TypeScript: "
  if npm run typecheck >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âœ…"
  else
    echo "âŒ"
    FAILED=1
  fi
  
  # Linting check
  echo -n "  ESLint: "
  if npm run lint >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âœ…"
  else
    echo "âŒ"
    FAILED=1
  fi
  
  # Quick unit tests
  echo -n "  Unit tests: "
  if npm run test:unit -- --passWithNoTests >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âœ…"
  else
    echo "âŒ"
    FAILED=1
  fi
  
  if [ $FAILED -eq 1 ]; then
    echo "\nâŒ Pre-commit checks failed. Fix issues before committing."
    echo "ğŸ“‹ Run 'npm run typecheck && npm run lint' to see errors"
    exit 2
  fi
  
  echo "\nâœ… All pre-commit checks passed"
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Build status check before push
if echo "${CLAUDE_TOOL_PARAMS_COMMAND}" | grep -qE '^git push'; then
  cd /Users/acedergr/Projects/alecs-mcp-server-akamai
  
  # Check if dist is up to date
  if [ -f "src/index.ts" ] && [ -f "dist/index.js" ]; then
    src_time=$(stat -f %m "src/index.ts" 2>/dev/null || stat -c %Y "src/index.ts" 2>/dev/null)
    dist_time=$(stat -f %m "dist/index.js" 2>/dev/null || stat -c %Y "dist/index.js" 2>/dev/null)
    
    if [ "$src_time" -gt "$dist_time" ]; then
      echo "âš ï¸  WARNING: Source files newer than build"
      echo "ğŸ“‹ Run 'npm run build' before pushing"
    fi
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Prevent hardcoded secrets
if [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" == *.ts ]] || [[ "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATH}" == *.js ]]; then
  # Create temp file with new content for checking
  temp_file=$(mktemp)
  
  # For Write tool, check the content directly
  if [ ! -z "${CLAUDE_TOOL_PARAMS_CONTENT}" ]; then
    echo "${CLAUDE_TOOL_PARAMS_CONTENT}" > "$temp_file"
  else
    # For Edit tools, we'll check after the edit
    exit 0
  fi
  
  # Check for hardcoded secrets
  if grep -qE '(client_secret|access_token|private_key)\s*[:=]\s*["'\''`][a-zA-Z0-9+/]{20,}["'\''`]' "$temp_file"; then
    echo "ğŸš« BLOCKED: Hardcoded credentials detected"
    echo "ğŸ“‹ Use environment variables or .edgerc configuration"
    rm "$temp_file"
    exit 2
  fi
  
  # Check for account switch keys
  if grep -qE 'accountSwitchKey\s*[:=]\s*["'\''`][A-Z]-[A-Z0-9]+["'\''`]' "$temp_file"; then
    echo "ğŸš« BLOCKED: Hardcoded account switch key detected"
    rm "$temp_file"
    exit 2
  fi
  
  rm "$temp_file"
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Clean up check on stop
cd /Users/acedergr/Projects/alecs-mcp-server-akamai

# Check for uncommitted changes
if git status --porcelain | grep -q '^[MADRC]'; then
  echo "ğŸ“ Uncommitted changes detected:"
  git status --short
fi

# Check if build is needed
if [ -f "tsconfig.json" ] && find src -name "*.ts" -newer dist/index.js 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
  echo "ğŸ”¨ Source files changed - consider running: npm run build"
fi

# Find temporary files that should be archived
temp_files=$(find . -name '*.md' -not -path './docs/*' -not -path './.archive/*' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name 'README.md' -not -name 'CLAUDE.md' -not -name 'CODE_ANNOTATION.md' -not -name 'DOCUMENTATION_ARCHITECTURE_PLAN.md' -mtime -1 2>/dev/null)
if [ ! -z "$temp_files" ]; then
  echo "ğŸ“ Consider archiving these temporary files:"
  echo "$temp_files" | sed 's/^/   /'
  echo "ğŸ“‹ Move to .archive/ directory"
fi

# Check for failed tests
if [ -f "package.json" ] && grep -q '"test"' package.json; then
  echo "ğŸ“‹ Remember to run tests before committing: npm test"
fi
